synopsis.text: In a distant land filled with intriguing towns and people, a traveler named Tortov Roddle has fantastical adventures. In one story, he comes across a patch of tempting red berries and happily eats many of them, only to realize afterward that they have potent hallucinogenic effects. Tortov then embarks on a surreal and mind-bending trip. In another tale, a young girl finds brief yet magical escapes from her mundane daily life through her imagination. And in a puzzling event, giant black apples inexplicably rain down from the sky onto a town, frightening the residents. However, they eventually find a creative use for this bizarre bounty. Through these surreal occurrences and dreamlike experiences, the inhabitants of this land react with imagination, resourcefulness, and good humor. Their journeys highlight the wonder and mystery that can be found even in life's strangest moments. Full of visual creativity and clever stories, this anime promises to take viewers on an entertaining trip to a delightfully unexpected world.
